mapper.sql: id, attachment_type, attachment_name, attachment_url, file_size, create_time, create_user, update_time, is_active
mapper.insert: insert into cms_attachment (id, attachment_type, attachment_name, attachment_url, file_size, create_time, create_user, update_time, is_active ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attachmentType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT} )

insert into cms_attachment
id,
attachment_type,
attachment_name,
attachment_url,
file_size,
create_time,
create_user,
update_time,
is_active,

mapper.update:
update cms_attachment
attachment_type = #{attachmentType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
attachment_name = #{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attachment_url = #{attachmentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cms_attachment set attachment_type = #{attachmentType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, attachment_name = #{attachmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attachment_url = #{attachmentUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from cms_attachment where create_time >= #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and create_time < date_sub(#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},interval -1 day)

select
from cms_attachment where create_time < #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and update_time >= #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
